title: SOLD: T206 Tinker, Ritter, and a few others (new cards added)

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Tinker, Ritter, and a few others (new cards added)
posts.post_content:
Evers: VG/EX; $150 SOLD
Magee: PR/FR; $150 SOLD
Ritter: VG/EX; $50 SOLD
Tinker: GD, but appears much nicer; $150 SOLD
McFarlin; VG/EX; $125 SOLD

or

take the remaining lot for $350 DLVD

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/img155l.jpg/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/8619/img155l.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/9/img156n.jpg/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1481/img156n.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

 
If you have any questions, please email me at [url]mengle2@insight.rr.com[/url]. 

Thanks,

Turner Engle

Email sent on Magee.


  Thanks Lee

Evers, Magee and McFarlin are now sold. 

Take the remaining two T206's (Tinker & Ritter) for $140 DLVD. 

Thanks,

Turner Engle

posts.post_title: The good, the bad, and the ugly
posts.post_content:
Let's try this again with some new cards in the mix. 


And yes, these are some well-loved examples. 


$150:
